item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Crowne Plaza Logo
Crowne Plaza is a British multinational chain of full service, upscale hotels headquartered in the United Kingdom. It caters to business travelers and the meetings and conventions market. It forms part of the InterContinental Hotels Group family of brands, which include InterContinental Hotels & Resorts and Holiday Inn Hotels & Resorts, and operates in nearly 100 countries with more than 431 hotels and 118,000 bedrooms, usually located in city centers, resorts, coastal towns or near major airports.
You can download theCrowne Plazalogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Crowne Plaza
item.description: Crowne Plaza is a British multinational chain of full service, upscale hotels headquartered in the United Kingdom. It caters to business travelers and the meetings and conventions market. It forms part of the InterContinental Hotels Group family of brands, which include InterContinental Hotels & Resorts and Holiday Inn Hotels & Resorts, and operates in nearly 100 countries with more than 431 hotels and 118,000 bedrooms, usually located in city centers, resorts, coastal towns or near major airports.

IHG Hotels & Resorts Logo InterContinental Hotels Group plc, marketed as IHG Hotels & Resorts, is a British multinational hospitality company headquartered in Denham, Buckinghamshire, England. It is listed on the London Stock Exchange and is a constituent of the FTSE 100 Index. Source
You can download theIHGlogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: IHG
item.description: InterContinental Hotels Group plc, marketed as IHG Hotels & Resorts, is a British multinational hospitality company headquartered in Denham, Buckinghamshire, England. It is listed on the London Stock Exchange and is a constituent of the FTSE 100 Index. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Circus Circus Logo
Circus Circus Las Vegas is a hotel and casino located on the northern Las Vegas Strip in Winchester, Nevada. It is owned and operated by Phil Ruffin. Circus Circus includes the largest permanent circus in the world. It features circus and trapeze acts, as well as carnival games, at its Carnival Midway. The resort also includes the Adventuredome, an indoor amusement park. Circus Circus was originally owned by Jay Sarno and Stanley Mallin.
You can download theCircus Circuslogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Circus Circus
item.description: Circus Circus Las Vegas is a hotel and casino located on the northern Las Vegas Strip in Winchester, Nevada. It is owned and operated by Phil Ruffin. Circus Circus includes the largest permanent circus in the world. It features circus and trapeze acts, as well as carnival games, at its Carnival Midway. The resort also includes the Adventuredome, an indoor amusement park. Circus Circus was originally owned by Jay Sarno and Stanley Mallin.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Accor Logo
Accor S.A. is a French multinational hospitality company that owns, manages and franchises hotels, resorts and vacation properties. It is the largest hospitality company in Europe, and the sixth largest worldwide. Accor operates in 5,199 locations in over 110 countries. Its total capacity is approximately 762,000 rooms. It owns and operates brands in many segments of hospitality: Luxury, premium, midscale, and economy. Accor also owns companies specialized in digital hospitality and event organization, such as onefinestay, D-Edge, ResDiary, John Paul, Potel & Chabot and Wojo.
You can download theAccorlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Accor
item.description: Accor S.A. is a French multinational hospitality company that owns, manages and franchises hotels, resorts and vacation properties. It is the largest hospitality company in Europe, and the sixth largest worldwide. Accor operates in 5,199 locations in over 110 countries. Its total capacity is approximately 762,000 rooms. It owns and operates brands in many segments of hospitality: Luxury, premium, midscale, and economy. Accor also owns companies specialized in digital hospitality and event organization, such as onefinestay, D-Edge, ResDiary, John Paul, Potel & Chabot and Wojo.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Aloft Hotels Logo
Aloft Hotels is a hotel chain based in North America, owned by Marriott International. The first hotel opened at the Trudeau International Airport in Montreal in 2008. Aloft Hotels have since opened across North America and internationally. Most Aloft hotels are located in city centers or in close proximity to airports. As of June 30, 2020, the chain had 183 hotels with 30,660 rooms. The brand is most notable for its modern architecture design style.
You can download theAloftlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Aloft
item.description: Aloft Hotels is a hotel chain based in North America, owned by Marriott International. The first hotel opened at the Trudeau International Airport in Montreal in 2008. Aloft Hotels have since opened across North America and internationally. Most Aloft hotels are located in city centers or in close proximity to airports. As of June 30, 2020, the chain had 183 hotels with 30,660 rooms. The brand is most notable for its modern architecture design style.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
AmericInn Hotels Logo AmericInn is an American hotel franchise founded in 1984 in the suburban Twin Cities. The chain is a mid-priced, limited-service hotel. As of December 31, 2018, it consists of 204 locations with 12,072 rooms throughout the United States, with the majority located in the Midwestern United States. Source
You can download theAmericInn Hotelslogo on full-version of the page. ]] >

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Amadeus CRS Logo
Amadeus is a computer reservation system owned by the Amadeus IT Group with headquarters in Madrid, Spain. The central database is located at Erding, Germany. The major development centers are located in Bangalore, Sophia Antipolis and Boston. In addition to airlines, the CRS is also used to book train travel, cruises, car rental, ferry reservations, and hotel rooms. Amadeus also provides New Generation departure control systems to airlines. Amadeus IT Group is a transaction processor for the global travel and tourism industry.
You can download theAmadeuslogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Amadeus
item.description: Amadeus is a computer reservation system owned by the Amadeus IT Group with headquarters in Madrid, Spain. The central database is located at Erding, Germany. The major development centers are located in Bangalore, Sophia Antipolis and Boston. In addition to airlines, the CRS is also used to book train travel, cruises, car rental, ferry reservations, and hotel rooms. Amadeus also provides New Generation departure control systems to airlines. Amadeus IT Group is a transaction processor for the global travel and tourism industry.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Carnival Corporation & plc Logo
Carnival Corporation & plc is a British-American cruise operator, currently the world’s largest travel leisure company, with a combined fleet of over 100 vessels across 10 cruise line brands. A dual-listed company, Carnival is composed of two companies – Panama-incorporated, US-headquartered Carnival Corporation, and UK-based Carnival plc – which function as one entity. Carnival Corporation is listed on the New York Stock Exchange, whereas Carnival plc is listed on the London Stock Exchange, with ADRs representing Carnival plc shares available on the New York Stock Exchange.
You can download theCarnival Corporationlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Carnival Corporation
item.description: Carnival Corporation & plc is a British-American cruise operator, currently the world’s largest travel leisure company, with a combined fleet of over 100 vessels across 10 cruise line brands. A dual-listed company, Carnival is composed of two companies – Panama-incorporated, US-headquartered Carnival Corporation, and UK-based Carnival plc – which function as one entity. Carnival Corporation is listed on the New York Stock Exchange, whereas Carnival plc is listed on the London Stock Exchange, with ADRs representing Carnival plc shares available on the New York Stock Exchange.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Mandarin Oriental Hotel Group Logo
Mandarin Oriental Hotel Group International Limited is a Hong Kong hotel investment and management group focusing on luxury hotels, resorts, and residences, with a total of 33 properties worldwide, 20 of which are fully or partially owned by MOHG. The Mandarin Oriental name was established in 1985 following the merger of Mandarin International Hotels Limited and the holding company of the hotel The Oriental, in which Mandarin had already acquired a 49% stake in 1974.
You can download theMOHGlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: MOHG
item.description: Mandarin Oriental Hotel Group International Limited is a Hong Kong hotel investment and management group focusing on luxury hotels, resorts, and residences, with a total of 33 properties worldwide, 20 of which are fully or partially owned by MOHG. The Mandarin Oriental name was established in 1985 following the merger of Mandarin International Hotels Limited and the holding company of the hotel The Oriental, in which Mandarin had already acquired a 49% stake in 1974.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Wynn Resorts Logo
Wynn Resorts, Limited is an American publicly traded corporation based in Paradise, Nevada that is a developer and operator of high end hotels and casinos. It was founded in 2002 by former Mirage Resorts Chairman and CEO Steve Wynn, and is now run by CEO Matthew Maddox. As of 2020, the company has developed six properties. Most notably, its flagship Wynn Las Vegas and Encore Las Vegas have each earned Five-Star status on the 2020 Forbes Travel Guide Star Rating list and are now the largest and second largest FTG Five-Star resorts in the world, respectively.
You can download theWynn Resortslogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Wynn Resorts
item.description: Wynn Resorts, Limited is an American publicly traded corporation based in Paradise, Nevada that is a developer and operator of high end hotels and casinos. It was founded in 2002 by former Mirage Resorts Chairman and CEO Steve Wynn, and is now run by CEO Matthew Maddox. As of 2020, the company has developed six properties. Most notably, its flagship Wynn Las Vegas and Encore Las Vegas have each earned Five-Star status on the 2020 Forbes Travel Guide Star Rating list and are now the largest and second largest FTG Five-Star resorts in the world, respectively.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Martinsa-Fadesa Logo Martinsa-Fadesa, S.A. was one of the main real estate and construction groups of Spain before the crash of the Spanish property bubble. It is based in Madrid, Spain. In 2007, Promociones y Urbanizaciones Martín, S.A. merged with Fadesa Inmobiliaria, S.A. to create Martinsa-Fadesa. The company went in to administration on 15 July 2008 after failing to pay off debts. Source
You can download theMartinsa Fadesalogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Martinsa Fadesa
item.description: Martinsa-Fadesa, S.A. was one of the main real estate and construction groups of Spain before the crash of the Spanish property bubble. It is based in Madrid, Spain. In 2007, Promociones y Urbanizaciones Martín, S.A. merged with Fadesa Inmobiliaria, S.A. to create Martinsa-Fadesa. The company went in to administration on 15 July 2008 after failing to pay off debts. Source

<! [CDATA[
Beefeate Logo Beefeater is a chain of over 140 pub restaurants in the United Kingdom, owned by Whitbread. The chain’s name references both the English figure of the beefeater, as well as its menu’s meat offering. The chain is positioned slightly upmarket of Whitbread’s Brewers Fayre chain. Source
You can download theBeefeatelogo on full-version of the page. ]] >

Coffee Logo Coffee #1 is a British coffee house chain that originated in Cardiff, Wales in 2001, and since 2019 has been majority owned by Caffè Nero. Coffee#1 has outlets along the M4 corridor, with others in Wales and southern England. Source
You can download theCoffeelogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Coffee
item.description: Coffee #1 is a British coffee house chain that originated in Cardiff, Wales in 2001, and since 2019 has been majority owned by Caffè Nero. Coffee#1 has outlets along the M4 corridor, with others in Wales and southern England. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Harris + Hoole Logo
Harris and Hoole is a British coffeehouse company headquartered in London and wholly owned by Caffè Nero. It was established in 2012 by Andrew, Nick and Laura Tolley, with investment from the British supermarket chain Tesco. The Harris + Hoole name comes from two coffee-loving characters in Samuel Pepys' diary. In February 2016, Tesco purchased the remaining 51% holding in the company that it did not already own to take full control of the business.
You can download theHarris Hoolelogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Harris Hoole
item.description: Harris and Hoole is a British coffeehouse company headquartered in London and wholly owned by Caffè Nero. It was established in 2012 by Andrew, Nick and Laura Tolley, with investment from the British supermarket chain Tesco. The Harris + Hoole name comes from two coffee-loving characters in Samuel Pepys' diary. In February 2016, Tesco purchased the remaining 51% holding in the company that it did not already own to take full control of the business.

Baymont Logo

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Best Western Hotels and Resorts Logo
Best Western International, Inc. owns the Best Western Hotels & Resorts brand, which it licenses to over 4,500 hotels worldwide. The franchise, with its corporate headquarters in Phoenix, Arizona, includes more than 2,000 hotels in North America. The brand was founded by M.K. Guertin in 1946. As of May 2019, David Kong is the president and CEO of Best Western and Dorothy Dowling is the chief marketing officer. Source Source
You can download theBest Westernlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >

item.description: Best Western International, Inc. owns the Best Western Hotels & Resorts brand, which it licenses to over 4,500 hotels worldwide. The franchise, with its corporate headquarters in Phoenix, Arizona, includes more than 2,000 hotels in North America. The brand was founded by M.K. Guertin in 1946. As of May 2019, David Kong is the president and CEO of Best Western and Dorothy Dowling is the chief marketing officer. Source Source

Dazzler Logo
Featuring sleek decor and exceptional service, Dazzler Hotels represent an exciting synthesis of comfort and functional aesthetics. Centrally located in some of Latin America’s most vibrant neighborhoods, Dazzler offers easy access to local hotspots and top attractions. Source
You can download theDazzlerlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Dolce Hotel & Resorts Logo
Dolce Hotels and Resorts’ awe-inspiring locations provide imaginative environments for guests to connect, create, and discover. State-of-the-art meeting spaces with advanced technology paired with Dolce sophisticated food and beverage program, offer an ideal combination for stimulating creativity. Whether it’s an award-winning golf courses, rejuvenating spas, or close proximity to the world’s most famous wineries, guests are drawn to Dolce for meetings, celebrations, and memory-making getaways. Source
You can download theDolcelogo on full-version of the page.
]] >

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Hawthorn Logo
Stay Hawthorn. Stay as you are. With free WiFi, on-site laundry services, healthy breakfast options and fitness centers, Hawthorn Suites provides everything guests need to stay on track during extended stays. Each spacious suite includes a full kitchen with dishware, glassware and utensils provided. Source
You can download theHawthornlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >

Each spacious suite includes a full kitchen with dishware, glassware and utensils provided. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Howard Johnson Logo
Howard Johnson’s, or Howard Johnson by Wyndham, is an American chain of hotels and motels located primarily throughout the United States and Canada. It had also once been a chain of restaurants for over 90 years and its name was widely known for that alone. Founded by Howard Deering Johnson, it was the largest restaurant chain in the U.S. throughout the 1960s and 1970s, with more than 1,000 combined company-owned and franchised outlets.
You can download theHoward Johnsonlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Howard Johnson
item.description: Howard Johnson’s, or Howard Johnson by Wyndham, is an American chain of hotels and motels located primarily throughout the United States and Canada. It had also once been a chain of restaurants for over 90 years and its name was widely known for that alone. Founded by Howard Deering Johnson, it was the largest restaurant chain in the U.S. throughout the 1960s and 1970s, with more than 1,000 combined company-owned and franchised outlets.

 Super 8 Motel Logo
With more than 2,800 hotels on four continents, the newly redesigned Super 8 offers affordable, innovative lodging on the open road. As your ultimate roadside companion, every location also offers free WiFi and a complimentary SuperStart Breakfast to get you recharged and refueled for the day ahead. Source Source

]] >

Travelodge Logo
With many of Travelodge hotels conveniently located near national parks and landmarks, Travelodge provides a basecamp for adventure. Travelodge’s friendly service, affordable rates and free continental breakfasts ensure that guests are rested and refueled for their next expedition. Source
You can download theTravelodgelogo on full-version of the page.
]] >

Tryp Logo
Powered By The City. Tucked in the heart of the world’s greatest cities, TRYP by Wyndham is on the pulse of local hotspots and must-see sites— from the best restaurants, the coolest spots and the best ways to tap directly into the pulse of whatever city – big or small – you’re exploring. Source
You can download theTryplogo on full-version of the page.
]] >

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Wingate Logo
Wingate by Wyndham is a brand of independently owned hotels that targets business travelers. Wingate opened its first hotel in July 1996. Since then, over 100 new Wingate by Wyndhams have been opened. It competes with chains like Hilton Garden Inn, Courtyard by Marriott, and Hyatt Place. Wingate by Wyndham is a part of Wyndham Hotels & Resorts, formerly part of Cendant. In late 2007, Wingate Inn officially changed its name to Wingate by Wyndham.
You can download theWingatelogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Wingate
item.description: Wingate by Wyndham is a brand of independently owned hotels that targets business travelers. Wingate opened its first hotel in July 1996. Since then, over 100 new Wingate by Wyndhams have been opened. It competes with chains like Hilton Garden Inn, Courtyard by Marriott, and Hyatt Place. Wingate by Wyndham is a part of Wyndham Hotels & Resorts, formerly part of Cendant. In late 2007, Wingate Inn officially changed its name to Wingate by Wyndham.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Worldmark Logo
WorldMark by Wyndham (formerly Trendwest) is the developer and marketer of WorldMark, The Club, a vacation ownership program and part of the Wyndham Worldwide Corporation. The original development partner of the Club was Trendwest International (TWI), a subsidiary of Jeld-Wenn Industries, a privately held door and window manufacturer. Source
You can download theWorldmarklogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Worldmark
item.description: WorldMark by Wyndham (formerly Trendwest) is the developer and marketer of WorldMark, The Club, a vacation ownership program and part of the Wyndham Worldwide Corporation. The original development partner of the Club was Trendwest International (TWI), a subsidiary of Jeld-Wenn Industries, a privately held door and window manufacturer. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Wyndham Logo
Simply Comfortable. With locations worldwide, each aspect of a Wyndham hotel or resort is designed with one thing in mind – your comfort. Wyndham enthusiastic staff strives to meet your needs with a warm smile and can-do attitude make sure each and every one has a great stay. From welcoming lobbies, to thoughtfully designed, homey guest rooms with incredible sleep experiences, to well-equipped fitness centers, each space is carefully considered to ensure you feel right at home.
You can download theWyndhamlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Wyndham
item.description: Simply Comfortable. With locations worldwide, each aspect of a Wyndham hotel or resort is designed with one thing in mind – your comfort. Wyndham enthusiastic staff strives to meet your needs with a warm smile and can-do attitude make sure each and every one has a great stay. From welcoming lobbies, to thoughtfully designed, homey guest rooms with incredible sleep experiences, to well-equipped fitness centers, each space is carefully considered to ensure you feel right at home.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Wyndham Grand Logo
Wyndham Grand’s beautiful destinations around the world combine premium amenities, restaurants, and spas with sophisticated architectural design to leave a lasting impression. From little luxuries that surprise and delight to friendly staff who go above and beyond, Wyndham Grand transforms ordinary experiences into unforgettable memories. Source
You can download theWyndham Grandlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Wyndham Grand
item.description: Wyndham Grand’s beautiful destinations around the world combine premium amenities, restaurants, and spas with sophisticated architectural design to leave a lasting impression. From little luxuries that surprise and delight to friendly staff who go above and beyond, Wyndham Grand transforms ordinary experiences into unforgettable memories. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Conrad Hotels Logo
Conrad Hotels & Resorts is an international brand of luxury hotels and resorts owned and operated by Hilton Worldwide. Conrad was considered the luxury flagship brand in the Hilton Family of Brands, named after company founder Conrad Hilton, until being supplanted by The Waldorf-Astoria Collection in 2006. As of December 31, 2018, it as 33 locations with 10,625 rooms, including two that are owned or leased with 778 rooms, 29 that are managed with 8,874 rooms, and two that are franchised with 973 rooms.
You can download theConrad Hotelslogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Conrad Hotels
item.description: Conrad Hotels & Resorts is an international brand of luxury hotels and resorts owned and operated by Hilton Worldwide. Conrad was considered the luxury flagship brand in the Hilton Family of Brands, named after company founder Conrad Hilton, until being supplanted by The Waldorf-Astoria Collection in 2006. As of December 31, 2018, it as 33 locations with 10,625 rooms, including two that are owned or leased with 778 rooms, 29 that are managed with 8,874 rooms, and two that are franchised with 973 rooms.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
DoubleTree Logo
DoubleTree by Hilton is an American hotel chain and a part of Hilton Worldwide. Most DoubleTree hotels are independently owned and operated by franchisees, but some are managed by Hilton Worldwide. Source
You can download theDoubleTreelogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: DoubleTree
item.description: DoubleTree by Hilton is an American hotel chain and a part of Hilton Worldwide. Most DoubleTree hotels are independently owned and operated by franchisees, but some are managed by Hilton Worldwide. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Hilton Logo
Hilton Worldwide Holdings Inc., formerly Hilton Hotels Corporation, is an American multinational hospitality company that manages and franchises a broad portfolio of hotels and resorts. Founded by Conrad Hilton in May 1919, the corporation is now led by Christopher J. Nassetta. Source
You can download theHiltonlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Hilton
item.description: Hilton Worldwide Holdings Inc., formerly Hilton Hotels Corporation, is an American multinational hospitality company that manages and franchises a broad portfolio of hotels and resorts. Founded by Conrad Hilton in May 1919, the corporation is now led by Christopher J. Nassetta. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Holiday Inn Logo
Holiday Inn is a British-owned American brand of hotels, and a subsidiary of InterContinental Hotels Group. Founded as a U.S. motel chain, it has grown to be one of the world’s largest hotel chains, with 1,173 active hotels and over 214,000 bedrooms as of September 30, 2018. The hotel chain’s headquarters are in Denham, Buckinghamshire. Source
You can download theHoliday Innlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Holiday Inn
item.description: Holiday Inn is a British-owned American brand of hotels, and a subsidiary of InterContinental Hotels Group. Founded as a U.S. motel chain, it has grown to be one of the world’s largest hotel chains, with 1,173 active hotels and over 214,000 bedrooms as of September 30, 2018. The hotel chain’s headquarters are in Denham, Buckinghamshire. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Hyatt Hotels Corporation Logo
Hyatt Hotels Corporation is an American multinational hospitality company that manages and franchises luxury hotels, resorts, and vacation properties. The Hyatt Corporation came into being upon purchase of the Hyatt House, at Los Angeles International Airport, on September 27, 1957. As of March 25, 2018, Hyatt has 777 properties in 54 countries. Fortune magazine ranked Hyatt #186 on its list of “America’s Best Employers” for 2018. Source
You can download theHyattlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Hyatt
item.description: Hyatt Hotels Corporation is an American multinational hospitality company that manages and franchises luxury hotels, resorts, and vacation properties. The Hyatt Corporation came into being upon purchase of the Hyatt House, at Los Angeles International Airport, on September 27, 1957. As of March 25, 2018, Hyatt has 777 properties in 54 countries. Fortune magazine ranked Hyatt #186 on its list of “America’s Best Employers” for 2018. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 MGM Grand Las Vegas Logo
The MGM Grand Las Vegas is a hotel and casino located on the Las Vegas Strip in Paradise, Nevada. The MGM Grand is the largest single hotel in the United States with 6,852 rooms. It is also the third-largest hotel complex in the world by number of rooms and second-largest hotel resort complex in the United States behind the combined The Venetian and The Palazzo. When it opened in 1993, the MGM Grand was the largest hotel complex in the world.
You can download theMGM Grandlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: MGM Grand
item.description: The MGM Grand Las Vegas is a hotel and casino located on the Las Vegas Strip in Paradise, Nevada. The MGM Grand is the largest single hotel in the United States with 6,852 rooms. It is also the third-largest hotel complex in the world by number of rooms and second-largest hotel resort complex in the United States behind the combined The Venetian and The Palazzo. When it opened in 1993, the MGM Grand was the largest hotel complex in the world.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Sheraton Hotels and Resorts Logo
Sheraton Hotels and Resorts is an international hotel chain owned by Marriott International. As of December 31, 2018, Sheraton operates 441 hotels with 155,617 rooms globally, including locations in North America, Africa, Asia Pacific, Central and South America, Europe, the Middle East and the Caribbean. Source
You can download theSheratonlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >

<! [CDATA[
Americ Inn Logo
AmericInn provides genuine hospitality in 200 welcoming locations across the US. With free hot breakfast, updated guest rooms, on-site fitness centers and inviting indoor pools at select locations, AmericInn is proud to make all travelers feel like neighbors. Source
You can download theAmeric Innlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Knights Inn Logo Knights Inn (officially Knights Franchise Systems, Inc.) is a full-limited service hotel chain owned by Red Lion Hotels Corporation and based in Denver, Colorado. Knights Inns used to be built with all-exterior corridors and medieval-inspired architecture, but the chain now has updated options for all Knights Inn properties. Source
You can download theKnights Innlogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Knights Inn
item.description: Knights Inn (officially Knights Franchise Systems, Inc.) is a full-limited service hotel chain owned by Red Lion Hotels Corporation and based in Denver, Colorado. Knights Inns used to be built with all-exterior corridors and medieval-inspired architecture, but the chain now has updated options for all Knights Inn properties. Source
